comments: Vucevic (CHI) slightly extends his arm into Strus' (CLE) body and marginal contact occurs during the pick.
DeRozan (CHI) maintains his pivot foot prior to the shot attempt.
Drummond (CHI) is in the lane for less than three seconds when the shot is imminent.
Allen (CLE) cleanly dislodges the ball from DeRozan (CHI) with his forearm during the start of his upward shooting motion near the basket.
Allen (CLE) contests the layup attempt and the contact that occurs with Drummond's (CHI) arm after the release is marginal.
Mitchell (CLE) maintains his pivot foot during the spin move at the start of his dribble.
Strus (CLE) lightly brushes DeRozan's (CHI) arm as he attempts to gather at the end of the drive, and the contact that occurs is marginal.
DeRozan (CHI) jumps alongside Garland (CLE) and cleanly blocks his driving shot attempt.
The ball is last touched by DeRozan (CHI) prior to it going out of bounds.
Dosunmu (CHI) and Mitchell (CLE) engage in incidental foot to foot contact off-ball.
Vucevic (CHI) legally contests Mobley's (CLE) jump shot attempt.
LeVert (CLE) initiates contact with Vucevic's (CHI) arm that affects his shot attempt near the rim.
Vucevic (CHI) maintains verticality as he absorbs the oncoming contact from Mitchell (CLE) at the end of the drive. The body contact that occurs is marginal.
Mitchell (CLE) cleanly deflects the ball from DeRozan (CHI) during his dribble.
DeRozan (CHI) gathers the ball on his left foot and takes one step as he legally establishes his right foot as his pivot, prior to releasing the jump shot attempt.
Strus (CLE) contests the jump shot attempt and marginal contact occurs after the release that does not affect DeRozan's (CHI) ability to land.
CLE attempts to call a timeout, which is not granted as a result of the expiration of the play clock when possession is controlled by Mobley (CLE).
Mobley (CLE) is moving alongside Vucevic's (CHI) path and the body contact that occurs as they come together during the drive is marginal.
The ball is last touched by Garland (CLE) prior to it going out of bounds.
Strus (CLE) maintains a legal guarding position as incidental foot to foot contact occurs with DeRozan (CHI).
DeRozan (CHI) briefly fumbles the ball as he receives the pass, gathers, and legally starts his dribble.
LeVert (CLE) briefly places his hand to White's (CHI) body during the drive, which he is able to move through as the contact is marginal.
Bitim (CHI) maintains his pivot foot during the spin move at the start of his dribble.
LeVert (CLE) maintains verticality and absorbs the contact that occurs during Bitim's (CHI) driving shot attempt.
A 24-second violation is correctly whistled.
Allen (CLE) establishes himself in DeRozan's (CHI) path and is firming up when he absorbs the oncoming contact during the pick.

Dosunmu (CHI) releases from his screening position and incidental head-to-head contact occurs wiith Strus' (CLE). Contact to an opponent's head/face can be deemed marginal when the result of a natural basketball move, provided the contact is not disproportionate or uncontrolled.
Vucevic (CHI) briefly engages with Strus (CLE) and marginal contact occurs as Strus moves to defend the shot.
Vucevic (CHI) makes contact with the ball that dislodges it from Garland (CLE) as he attempts to gather at the end of the drive. Any arm contact after the ball is dislodged is deemed incidental.
Garland (CLE) does not pin the ball to his body during his dribble.

call_type: Turnover: Lost Ball Out of Bounds
comments: The ball is last touched by Garland (CLE) prior to it going out of bounds.
Strus (CLE) brushes DeRozan's (CHI) arm and marginal contact occurs as DeRozan gathers the ball at the end of the drive.
Strus (CLE) moves alongside DeRozan's (CHI) path and marginal body contact occurs during the driving shot attempt. Strus' arm comes down and avoids making contact with DeRozan's arm.
Vucevic (CHI) extends his arms and dislodges Allen (CLE) from his rebounding position that affects his ability to pursue the loose ball.
White (CHI) briefly places his hand to Mitchell's (CLE) side off-ball, which Mitchell is able to release from to receive the pass.
White (CHI) moves alongside Mitchell's (CLE) path and the body contact that occurs during the driving shot attempt is marginal.
Allen (CLE) maintains verticality and absorbs the contact that occurs during DeRozan's (CHI) driving shot attempt.
White (CHI) commits a take foul on Mitchell (CLE).
Allen (CLE) moves into DeRozan's (CHI) space and initiates contact to his arm at the start of his upward shooting motion which affects his jump shot attempt.
Mitchell (CLE) releases from White (CHI) as slightly extends his forearm and brushes his body at the end of the drive, which is marginal.
Bitim (CHI) contests Mitchell's (CLE) jump shot and the contact after the release, and follow-through, is marginal.
